main event: An airline pilot sighted a round white-tan object that changed colors and shape while flying at 18,000 feet.
interesting points: The object changed from pink to bluish-white and from round to elliptical,The sighting lasted for 11 minutes,The object changed course after 7 minutes and made a 20-degree turn,The Navy aircraft in the area did not sight the object,The size of the object was compared to a quarter held at arm's length.
location: 19 miles north of Putnam, Connecticut, USA
witness description: airline pilot from North East Airlines, Boston, MA
